values: i also like jan. 25, 18, 9...when i say i like it, i mean i wrote what i felt. why am i going back to my past? God nos.

Ok, some things i wrote in my ljs was not entirely right. i was acting like i was mature and grown up, but i really wasn't. I sounded like i knew what was going on with me and inside of me, but i only had an inkling of it. 
i think sometimes i wrote just cuz it made me feel more mature and in control, especially when the entry sounded nice. I do think the ljs get better as time passes. I like the one i wrote on nov 6, feb 28...

Just in case i die some day...before my journals are discarded i want people to read the poems and the january fourth entry. 
i went to see a mental health professional today. finding myself and getting life back in order is going to be an impossible....ahhhhhhhhhhhhhh....how am i going to get through tom. and the day after and the day after.... 
i took Lexapro today. lets see if it works.

I dont know what to write. But i know i want to write. now i am trapped. The only way out of it is if some other external force kills me. i want to think bout only me and just die. just end it. just finish it. i dont want anything.
What do i do? God, Matt, Helen, Dani, and I met today. They listened. y dont i feel better? Y do i want to die so badly right now? y...damn..damn...please...just allow me to go to Tacony. I cant take this anymore.

I feel illiterate again. BG, i twisted the truth like usual. in guidance...I want to die right now so damn badly. forget hw. forget school.  
Father said how strong he is. he was implying im not strong. whatever. i should have known. Im glad he didnt understand though. BG, u no how it is. It's easier for me to deal with mum dad not undertsanding. cuz if they understand, i dont no how to deal with it. im so used to not having a relationship with them. i dont no what i would have done if father had said Jigna, ur not weak...... ok im crazy. thats not the way it should sound. 
I have three choices now. Choice number one i tell the guidance people how unbearable im feeling. choice number two i tell them a softer version of how im feeling. chocie number three i smile and cover it up and just wait until the right moment to commit suicide. i did a combo of choice 2 n 3 today. except i didnt do it on purpose. i guess my desire to be liked and tendency to not be me led to it. no matter what im still going to be on the look out for the right moment to die. BG i really want to talk to someone. but BG what did i do that those two people sat n listened to me? r they only listening cuz im a kid at ryan and its their responsibility to?
I wanted to get some help. so i told guidance...BG i dont feel better. i dont want to die any less than i did for the last five months. 
i should have told them no one undertsands. no one understands. what do i do? i dont feel better. i do feel like a crazy human being. i wish i had never been born. i wish i had died yesterday. i wish i had died when i took the crocins. i wish i had fallen in that pond years ago.
I CAN NOW SAY NO ONE UNDERSTANDS. NO ONE. NO ONE. or no maybe people do understand. its not fixable though. im always going to be this screwed up. oh God where do i find the courage to get through today? tom? please let me die. please let me die. please let me die. please i dont want to hurt like this anymore.please. please.

I am writing one more time unfortunately. BG, it actually looks like Im gona continue writing and hurting.
I talked to guidance. BG, why was i so stupid to tell them about my lovely suicidal desires? The more i talked the more unbrilliant material I said. I told them about the mini ocean behind dollar store.
ok this is what yesterday was like. I drove to Tacony. could not find courage to get out of van. slept for fifteen minutes approximately. next i got myself back on Robbins and drove on the bridge. There i noticed the water was in fact not frozen. my scaredycat nature makes excuses all the time. The beauty of Delaware river made me cringe. All of a sudden i wanted to jump off Tacony rather than in some pond or river behind dollar. But i noticed i brought no money with me, so i couldnt exactly recross Tacony. I assumed i'd succeed anyway. I got to the parking lot behind the memorial for deceased soldiers near dollar. I got out of the van and did what i'd done before at Tacony. I put my pajamas between the locking mechansim attached to the van and the attaching thing on the door. I threw the keys into the van. and closed the door. My mind plotted. Since i seemed to have all the time in the world, i pondered and walked to the pond. I stared at the pond. What a joy, I thought, the pond isnt frozen. I saw two people coming. so i sat down on the bench and waited for them to finish. one walk up the hill. two laps around the pond. huh. fustration increasing for another lady came. another two laps. a police car passed. a red truck passed. all the ducks flew off the pond. finally i went to the edge of the murky pond. there was this odd plasticy thing all around the edges about one to two feet in. The water wasnt deep. At least three feet in all around i could see the floor. Disappointment. there was no way i was going to waddle myself in and assume the water in the middle was deep. Now being alive scared me shitless. So i started walking on the trail that led into the woods.
Meanwhile, the cold was getting to me. My courage was evaporating. I trotted into the woods. Whoa. what was that i saw on my right? something blue. i ran on the path that led to blue. It was a river or something. It was blue and gorgeous. it looked like a mini ocean, with wind creating waves that clashed with the rockless sand. I cautiously stepped on the sand despite my initial reason to be there. 
I walked as far as possible until there was ice across all the sand. I went back to where i started.I was cold. The sun was facing my back; the wind blowing in my face. i turned around. couldnt stand the piercing winds. i walked towards the sun again. i dont know how long i did that. maybe minutes maybe hours. Every second on that sand seemed hours long. I kept saying y wont i do it. im a coward. im a coward. im scared. no. no. i walked some more. I somehow hoped i'd see a dead body. i'd get some courage to die. n then i thought maybe if it was warm it would have been easier. Maybe if i felt my feet it would have been easier. maybe if i'd gone to tacony...
no. no. i cant be a coward. i must do it. think. pain. pain. death is better. so i run into the water. but then at one foot deep my mind says its scared of how it'll feel when there wont be ground underneath. i cant take the image of me being under water and gasping for breath. and i dont even know when the water gets deep or if it gets deep at all. i see dirt in the water. the thought of its taste makes me move back a step. i want to throw up. i scream quietly and run to the log some ten feet from the river. i cry. 

Now tell me im weak.

i dont no y im writing this. my writing disgusts me to the point that i havent written in so long. but i stopped writing cuz i as livin this double standard life...
let me get to the point i might die tom. morning or i might not. but i feel so dead. thats all.

I could go out and look for a job but i can barely manage school where am i going to find the confidence and so on so forth to find a job? i'll stuck in this cycle of guilt until i dont find a way to help mum dad financially. but how? 
sorry i cant write....its too hard........n i no i sound like a i dont no what

I am not killing myself on whim. u no how long i've wanted it. people dont want things on whim for so long. 
i cant take it. That's simply all i have to say in my defense. I dont want to hurt so much but still act in front of everyone.......
I want to tell PB the below info which i stole off of a website.

Myth: Teens who claim to be depressed are weak and just need to pull themselves together. There's nothing anyone else can do to help. 

The question is...why didnt i survive? y did it affect me so much that it literally made my goal impossible to acheive and survival so unendurable? PLEASE why is dyying so hard and so difficult to carry out...its so easy to plan.. i want to die but than i think what if i somehow dont die n then i miss tom. exam? i dont have strength though to get through another minute. i want to die but then i think what if i somehow survive and i cant hav a complete semester? oh u unfair life why is getting one thing so hard? how much more strength do i have to pull out of an empty hat? Before there is a hole in that hat i must die die die die die die die.

i think ive hid my desires pretty well from helen and tesla and the rest of the world. I love u people. but what if im losing my chance to be all that i've wanted to? well i've already lost it all becoming this perosn...so there is no point in life but i cant do it. y doesnt anyone hear me? i dont want to feel so bad anymore. get rid of this pain...please. or give me pain i can explain in words.

i hate going to school everyday and somehow surviving. and coming home and going to sleep so i dont ahve to think bout me. n i hate going to school everyday and talking and worrying and acting. i cant hide it but i do anyway. cuz im an asshole and hypocrite. and i want to be dead. and im going through this alonne. and i wish i were never born as mum wishes,. and i hope i die. and i hope people hget help. i hope i dont fail. i hate hope.

and i hate crying like this everyday so i have neough stuff to survive another day. who said i didnt try? WHERE DO I GET MORE STRENGTH FROM? MUM DAD I DONT HAVE ANYMORE OF WHARTEVER IT TAKES TO BE ALIVE HAPPILY.

Pain. Pain. Pain. I want to yell at the top of my lungs and jump off Tacony. Nevermind that. This was the worst day...no....it was one of those days when u feel like ur at the end of the cliff every minute ur awake.

I MUST END IT.

First, when im sure i wanna die, i dont have the guts to die.
Then when i figure out a way, find some courage, i wanna die when im not at the bridge n when i get there...i sit in the van or walk halfway.............
Universal Being.

It hurts so bad....i feel so damn down...so sad...so end of the cliff....n now i feel like an asshole for complaining...BG there arent enough words...the right words dont exist for me to explain.
Danielle was mad at Helen this morning. I hope it wasnt cuz of me. Helen turned red, she looked like she was about to cry. How could i face her at lunch? How will i face mum dad about the 100 dollar ticket? but that doesnt matter. what matters is helen. im such a horrible person. I know im messed up and helen needs someone who isnt so messed up. im not a good friend for her. Im a horrible person because i choose to keep my mouth shut and go on every day burning inside. becasue even though i think i can manage, i cant. If i had been strong enough to manage than i wouldnt be messing up so badly. if i had been strong enough to kill myself i would have never had to see this day or any of the last few days. I'd rather die thinking Tesla and me have a great relationship. 

i hope after me helen and danielle have the best relationship. I never ever wanna see Helen have that expression again. I forgot how much it hurts to see her sad.

I dont want to see mum dad so sad with dark circles around their eyes.
Besides though,

Most of all, i cant go on feeling like this anymore. what's the most that could happen if someone realizes how much i desire to die?
BG, i guess things are easier to wish than to do. I wish i could say i want to die and i'd die. 
Im not giving up. u no how much i tried. im a whole new person with the depression. 
Im not a joke, and there is no way im going to live a life where i dont no how im going to be feeling the next day. Why did i have to worry about whether the formal night would be one of the extra sad or extreme sad or sad days?

This is a quick update in case mum dad come across this while searching ofr me. at the moment I intend to drive to Tacony and jump off the bridge. Um. please if u can find my body in time, i'd like to be an organ donar. Matt, i regret that we never could be together. Also, dont feel bad. I promise, everything ewill be fine after im gone.

Im pretty sure its happening today. I hope the people i've written messages for in my journals get the messages.i dont know how im going to survive. dude im scared shitless. I hope everyone is happy and strives. 

Tesla thanks for making my life so much more bearable.

im so behind with my apps. and all these brilliant people got in...so i dont stand a chance. i cant believe i actually got a 630 and 650 on my SATs.....its creepy......................but oh well. i wish i had a bad day today. it would have made everything a lot easier.

Im at the library right now. Im going crazy. I have to die tonight. I feel so bad, u see, i've been doing things without asking mum dad lately. and its horrible. I love u all. im going to tacony creek.

no point in writing greetings r there? Its just another lovely journal entry by me. im very animated today. No, actualy, inside im livid. Wanna no y? I decided today would be my absolute last, last day, but im still here. still breathing. still talking. still thinking. Im so fed up and tired of this. I must somehow die.
It was perfect. i thought i'd find a river and jump in. The end. But i had to complicate matters by avoiding the unavoidable, delaying the undeniable.
I really think the depression is lifting. but i still have this crappy sinking feeling inside, but more than that, i loath who i have become. I am a serious joke. I have no integrity, virtues, or qualities anymore. I am just a tired person trying to force my way through each day; this way, im doing way way below my potential. Here is the worst part. i know its over. I know its my time to die right now. I know how to. the question is now how do i make myself? first it was should i or not? then how should i? then how do i get the right mentality? EXCUSES< EXCUSES< EXCUSES. I'll tell u what. Stop making a freaking joke of ur self, Jigna. I have become a joke. an absolute joke. trying to act normally when all i want to do is get a knife and kill me and the wall next to me pays off, doesnt it? Going through each day even when i dont want to is bound to turn me into the joke of a comedian right? 
I DONT WANT MONEY. My problems have nothing to do with money. I feel so greedy, so undeserving of the ninety dollars i have, even if i know im being harsh on myself. i cant help the way i feel. I feel all dirty and unclean when i drive the car because it makes me feel powerful, have confidence, yet the confidence, the power just isnt mine in my brain, so i shouldnt feel it. I feel even worse cuz i no i dont have enough of anything mentally to go to a dance. if mum dad tell me im horrible. i'll believe it. if mum tells me she wishes she hadnt brought me into this world, I'll definitely believe it ( she told me that on friday). Actually, i believe bringing me into this world was mother's worst mistake. Im so so disgusted with myself. If someone tells me im selfish, i'll belive it. if someone tells me im nice, i wont belive it. I dont no whats ight or wrong anymore. I have no identity. im so scared of everything. dont u see how much of a joke i've become? Im such a joke that i say i'll kill myself, but i dont, i wont. im insane. cuz i can repeat i want to die, i have to die to myself a million times while having a completely normal conversation with everyone online and on the phone. I dont want to have any conversation. i just want to stop existing. i hate me so so so much. and i hate it that i dont support myself. that i dont believe in myself. that im such a coward and non risk taker. u damn whatever. u universal being. i have to die. im beyond, hope, faith, and cure. cuz im never going to be able to make anyone understand that i need some sort of help, cuz i dont no what that sort of help is even. i want to go away from home so so badly. it feels like my insdies r gonna explode. i feel guility for being able to drive the car, go to  a dance, want a dress, want clothes, not help the guy on the bus, the guy outside th ebeer store, not find a job, not send apps, making everyone dress me up fpr dance. y is everyone so happy for me anyway? People do mistakes by liking me. i think they all internally no how empty, messedup, lost, pained, integrity less, value less, feeling less, selfish i am. they r some nice people to still stick by. therefore i conclude. I DO NOT WISH TO DO THIS ANYHORE> HA. if that means anything. my words have become as meaning less as my life. i doubt myself. i hate me. i cant live with me.

u no what annoys me. Mother's way of having a talk with me. its so pointless adn pathetic. she doesnt realize i'd never answer her if she continues that method of talking. well, i'll never tell her my feelings. i cant anymore. even if she manages to act like a human being with a heart i wont be able to open up with my family. we've raised like that. but mother first brings up the subject. then i make a weird annoyed but not mean face. then she charges me with ?s. i choose to either not answer or leave. cuz i hate talking to her bout anything that involves me. she charges me with not only questions but also words. she physically confronts me and makes her eyes tearful purposelly and acts like a pathetic messed up seven year old. she literally blocks my passage. it so sad that i want to rip pillows and laugh at the same time. so u nowhat i do? since i beleive i dont have to answer anyone who confronts me so pathetically and disrespectfully, i'll make up a satisfying answer for her and swallow my pride and annoyance. then go upstairs. this way she'll be quiet and i didnt tell her the real stuff. but the sad part is i love her like hell. how is it possible to get annoyed at someone so much while also loving um so much too? i dont think we're ever gona have a great mother daughter relationship. she doesnt bend and i dont want to bend with her or for her.
i think bout her words accidentally every darn day. 
so moral of atory. trying to not do hw at the momnet. no i really wanna die. but im fustrated cuz i have no idea how to die.

Sometimes friends or family members can recognize that a person is depressed. They may respond with love, kindness, or support, hoping that the sadness will soon pass. They may offer to listen if the person wants to talk - although depressed people often don't feel much like talking or can't find the words to describe what's wrong. If the depressed feeling doesn't pass with a little time, friends or loved ones may encourage the person to get help from a doctor or mental health professional.

But not everyone recognizes depression when it happens to someone they know. And some people have incorrect ideas about what it means to be depressed. People who don't understand may react to the depressed person's low energy with criticism, scolding them for acting lazy or not trying. Some people mistakenly believe that depression is simply an attitude a person can change or a mood they can shake. It's not that easy.

Many people just don't realize that depression can cause so many problems or so much pain. Sometimes even people who are depressed don't take their condition seriously enough. Some people have the mistaken belief that depression comes from weakness or is a character flaw. This myth causes some people to hide their depression. Feeling embarrassed, they may avoid getting help.

 Hi. That was from some health website. For some time, I believed mother and father didnt help me with how im feeling cuz there must be something wrong with me. they must have seen the evil or something I harbour inside. Or maybe i am "selfish, lazy, careless," and so on as mother and Pb say. Dont worry, I didnt just have the realization that I really am depressed ( thats an understatement), but since i found this website...it had the perfect wording. 
 Here's the deal. Before i thought i was exaggerating the way i feel. but its soo much pain...and. When i heard father tell someone that my aunt Jaya has depression, i realized thy dont really know much bout it. Mother thinks im acting the way i am cuz of numerous reasons: too much tv, boys, sex, americanization etc.. But i watch too much TV cuz i hate myself. and i hate being with me yet i hate being with anyone too. its creepy. I feel so horrible. its like mother and father are brick walls and i feel locked in.
 i've been in it too long for denial. im out of that. but it still seems incorrect to be so straightforward about it, even if its on a journal that nobody reads. how do  i go up to father or maother and explain this stuff? when i can barely understand it. They d call me weak for "giving up" or wanting to die so so so badly.
 im 17 i dont really classify myself as a kid anymore. but the heck with that...
 i did a small experiment accidently. for a 2 weeks i tried to accept the pain and not think about suicide as often. and last wednesday, i actually tried to look forward to something. Guess what? when i came home on wednesday i wanted to die more than ever. each day was as horrible as the days i'd think bout killing me. the pain it didnt go away. the day that i actually hoped a little was the worst day of my life. everything i hoped for kinda crashed in front of my eyes. so it was double hurt and pain. frankly...i dont no what to do since i cant die. how can i die. 
 y doesnt anyone understand? well i guess thats cuz i didnt tell anyone. but how do i tell anyone, when my own parents dont undertand it? i cant imagine going up to some teacher and saying i've been feeling like poop for the last seven months. im exhausted. im weak cuz i cant kill myslef. y cant i do something to die. y faliure in every damn thing. i thought i'd be able to do some work this holiday, u no im taking the sat IIs next sat....but nothing....i did nothing. i saved it all for sunday. yyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy... i really tired to make me do it. but it didnt work. 
 how did igo from the old jigna to this new person. i mean great now i no what depression is, but whats the point of knowing if all i want now is death. u no how sad it is right now? i imagine miraculous instances when i find a gun in the woods and i can kill myself. or a robber comes and i could take his gun...but i cant sit around like this until someone shows up with a gun.
 i think mother and father have their images of pscyhiatric care from indian tv serials. if someone goes into an asylum or is dubbed as crazy, they get electro convulsive therapy. The TV serials make it look all painful and unjust, but they dont show that there is more to mental illnesses than ECTs. come on Ekta koopar can do better than that. they create an image that all people in mental hospitals receive it, but that infact is very very incorrect. it depends on the mental illness whether someone gets it, and here it is usually voluntary. it is done under anesthesia. ECTs may have been abused long ago, but hopefully that isnt the case now.i dont no if im right but y would using ECTs help someone whose mind is the mind of a seven year old (in the case of Koshish). look im not saying i need to be in some hospital. i just wanna feel happy or die. i mean this obviously isnt just a "phase" as pinku mildly puts it. if thats the feeling of regular life than i'd rather be a tree.
 it bothers me how we single out people with mental disorders. I mean just by doing that, we're saying once ur in, ur in...then u cant be a normal part of society. but thats ridiculous..cuz u can go back to being "normal" with some care and acceptance. i feel like cursing at everyone...including my family for not knowing, not undertsanding, not seeing it my way. But i should understand. cuz before this so-called sadness i was oblivious to mental illnesses. i knew bout as much mother and father know now. u no what mother said today...its kinda funny, " im going to get depression too" in the tone that she usually says she'll get brain hemorrhaging from me... That fact of life at the moment is that mother most likely is mildly depressed. she doesnt eat or eats a lot. has insomnia sometimes.. is definitely sad and angry lots of times. feels inferior. etc...
 i know grammetically i've made plenty of errors, but i have so much hw...n i have bout 3 hours to finsih sooooooooooooooo much....its pathetic. i guess i should get ready for another painful day...like the weekend. for once y cant i do what i want? like die or not have to talk or do anything at all. mother keeps on asking me y i sleep so much. seriously for some time she thought i was pregnant. i felt like ripping five pillows then.but i just stood there. i mean how could she? thats pathetic. thats like no trust at all!!! i 've never intentionally hugged a boy let alone having sex! i feel so awkward around the males sometimes that just standing next to them makes me feel all jittery and uncomfortable. and other times, like with matt, i want to give um a hug. but i cant even tap the kids shoulder withour thinking bout it for five minutes.
 y r my parents making me feel worse, when i should undertsand their position. y cant they be open minded? y do they make me feel guilty for everything? or y do i feel guilty for everything? u no i was thinking how not speaking up affected my four h.s. years. it affected them pretty badly. seriously sooooooooooooooooooooooooo much was affected by it that its pathetic. that i want to redo it cuz i can see so many stupid mistakes or not speaking up.........
Thats it, im going to put all my energy into figuring out a way to die. i just dont want to fail this time. im doing hHORRIBLE in school. but many people that just met me this year think this is who i am, but they dont understand. this isnt me...
ok i wish me goodluck in dying. I'll put all myenrgy into it. somehow its gotta ork. sometimes i think the universal being is intentionally preventing me from dying, when technically thats not supposed to happen cuz it depends on my karmas etc.... so gotta die.

It hurts so much. Every damn day, God, every damn day im in a daze...Everyday i wonder when i will get to die or when i will surpass my limits. how much strength do i have stored up in there? how can i manage to go to school everyday and smile and survive hurting so much? Please. im not joking. I really cant take this anymore. i honestly think if i hadnt met tesla i would have broken my last string on Thurs. I wish i hadnt met her. Cuz the pain is still there. im glad  have helen matt nikki lauren...

but i cant do this anymore. pls. i dont care make me a tree..but i cant take this anymore. am i joke? its been seven freakin months since i've wanted to die...see how much of a failure i am. 

its like im pregnant. i may not remember all the days i played with mother and father and pinku, but i remember all the days and minutes of pain for the last months. its like i've never felt anything else and if i have heck i dont recall it. the last weeks have been so difficult that it seemed like weeks when it was actually 10 days. You hear that? Does anybody care to hear how difficult, how tedious, how abrasive, how painful each day is for me. Its like i have the best friend i always childishly envisioned myself to have. except that friend isnt human...

some may say its kind of weird im in so much pain but none of my friends or family or acquaintances did much? I dont no what to say bout it, except that its irreversible and unfixable. i'll never forget the pain if it goes away; I'll never survive if the pain stays. There is no way out of it. 

Mother thinks im in love with someone or that TV influenced me to become like this. How ridiculous! Does she even no how im feeling? Its like a wall. the pain is never going to go away. How can i explain depression when she doesnt believe in things like that? 

This world is horrible. Im sry. I feel like im being dragged down a road tied to a car speeding at 60 mph. But im still alive. rgt? some would say u have so much to be thankful for. i say im tired. being thankful doesnt rid me of the pain. the constant misery. i dont no if others feel like this. if there are people, then my heart aches for them. i wish i was in a state to help people. its so hard for me to survive each day that i dont no how to help people. i dont no where to get the confidence. geting through each day is like climbing the same, steep mountain everyday to come down everyday and climb it again the next...

howcome i fail over and over? am i not lovable? am i ugly cuz i gained lots and lots of weight in the last months? y is it everytime i wish well for someone the opposite seems to happen? is that a figment of my imagination? everytime i wish for something, plan for something, expect something it doesnt happen. I like matt so much. i just want him to look at me. treat me like a real friend cuz i no i cant go out with him. if i could ahve a kiss it would make my life fulfilled...but i no thats wrong.

mother thinks im pregnant when i've neve kissed a boy in my life. ha. cuz my period is late and i sleep a lot.now shes lecturing/ so im going to go to sleep. cuz i dont have any strength....

help people...haha...IM A TOTAL FAILURE> NO ONE SHOULD BE MY FRIEND> PEOPLE MISTAKE MY \............DEATH plaease DEAATHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH

Hi People im still alive.
Guess what? I am so so so so happy. It's unbelievable isnt it? I havent felt this good in months. The magic that caused my happiness today was Tesla. At first, when Tesla was talking with Lucky, I did not pay attention. Once I started paying attention to them and Tesla's laughs, I couldnt believe my eyes. Tesla had a genuine laugh. She was really, truely joyful. She apparently likes that kid from the bottom of her heart. People, im so happy for her. It feels as if its happening to me. Seriously, those two seconds I saw her laugh I forgot all the pain, the misery...everything except Tesla's happiness.

This is enough ammunition for me to survive the week. Seeing Tesla Wednesday night helped too, but today in school I found out Dani and Matt had a blast together at the dance. im happy for them, but y does this always happen to me? I know im depressed, boring, and messed up. I still have feelings. I like Matt. Maybe more than im willing to accept.  

But putting all that aside, each day is getting harder and harder to cope with. Before Wednesday night I seriously felt that weak last string was going to snap. I sound pathetic. How can i explain it? How? the pain? the misery? its still not bearable, but i can write now. The last few weeks it had gotten so bad that I couldnt write. It felt so overwhelming, worse than i had ever felt it. I know its going to get worse. and i know eventually i wont be able to write.

Each day is different. No day is the same. I cant even go to sleep expecting something. Sometimes i do better, other days, sometimes three in a row, it feels like my insides are going to explode. But whether each day is bad, worse, or at its worst...there is this constant pain inside. The only way out of it is sleeping so i at least dont remember feeling it. Its this rough, strong, dead end, sad, painful feeling that I cannot explain in words. When the pain escalates its impossible to write...i dont know how i survive school. 

I'll do anything to die. How can I die. It takes so mauch energy to go through each day, that i dont no where to find the energy to plan a successful suicide. Please let me die.

Im still alive. The Aston Road traintracks didnt work because septa is on strike. I have no way of getting to the tracks. Im going to search for amtrak train tracks. 
Meanwhile, I need to surivive school, life... Each day is so hard to get through. I cant do it anymore. I cant take this pain. Why am i so healthy? Why cant I die? I ask myself everyday why there are people dying with cancer that want to live and why is there me living everyday wanting to die? 
i come home everyday to battle myself internally and I end up watching Tv anyway. Television is my outlet to everything these days. writing does not help at all, unlike before. Im writing because im still alive. I come home to watch television and stare and cry so that i have enough strength to go through the next day. im taking each day as it comes lately, but even that is too too painful.

but seriously, who has a problem like me? My problem is i cant succeed in killing myself.

Hi. Just in case anyone reads these. I failed. i tried three different methods. I feel like a failure. i have passed my limits. If i dont figure out another way to kill myself soon, im going to explode.

I just read my first entry. I guess it's only right that I continue where I left off. It only makes sense. I mentioned that I was having trouble concentrating and keeping my grades up. I also directly said that this was Helen's fault. I dont believe it was Helen's fault. Things were on a downfall for me since soph year. i was having trouble (maybe not as much) concentrating since soph year. It just escalated junior year and the summer, and perhaps my reaction to Helen's "supposed" rejection along with my insecurity in all aspects hastened the process. I would like to fix what i wrote about not being first for anyone. that doesnt matter. And I have found Tesla. Shra, also sarva, is very very important to me. if i was going to live and anything happens to shra, i would seriously explode. she emans the world to me. Helen does too. After Dec. 12, things actually got worse. Dec 17, I wrote another not saying this is my last day, etc.., etc... It obviously wasnt. Im glad it wasnt. Although I would have loved to die, I have realized a couple of things since then. i have understood more things since then. I eventually realized inside Helen will always hold a spcial place. But that does not confine her to me. Im sure a lot of people feel that way for helen. It's hard to explain, so i will try my best to clarify it. I have lost faith in the term best friend. Let me put it this way, all the people I know hold some place inside. Some are more important to me than others, but not in a degrading way. Those I spent more time, opened up more with are obviously going to be closer. But that does not mean I dont care about people. i really care about people. Some say a best friend is someone who understands you, believes in you, and is close to you. I say, anyone can do those things. Now someone, infact, any human being can fill those requirements by spending time with me and being honest. im close to a lot of people and i believe a lot of people feel close to me. calling someone a best friend is pretty much putting ur friends in order. Meaning, you are rating them. Yet everyone is important. i believe Helen understood this, and if not, she had a rationale along the smae lines. It was me that failed to recognize this. It was after the camping trip, which by the way was the best time i ever had with helen and the best trip i've ever been on, i realized i should appreciate what we had and have. For example, I really really care about both Jenny and Tesla. I may feel closer to tesla, but that doesnt make me care more for tesla than i care for jenny. i hope that helps you understand my philosophy. Tesla means so much to me, i dont have words to explain. Pinku holds a dear dear place in my heart too. I would be devastated if anything happened to him. I hope he can move on and try to be more empathetic in all areas of life. Back to junior year. Spiritually, I came to strongly believe in the universal being that is in everything alive even u me and the koch roach in the basement. i tried my best to become an advocate for non violence. whether my actions show it or not, non violence is something i strongly belive in. i also started feeling calmer and i rarely got angry the way i used to. i dont know if anyone noticed or not though. and i also tried to become more empathetic. Mentally though, no matter how much more i wanted to help people and pray, i was corroding. i desperately, for the last three months of school, wanted someone to help me. i felt there was and is this barrier that i couldnt tell anyone. for one i thought it was weird the way i was feeling. i thought i was babying myself. and i know thats not true for a fact as of now, but if i were to ask dad mum or pb for help tom. theyd say i am babying myself. I had huge dreams to help people but somehow things just kept on getting worse for me and i couldnt do what i wanted to. right now, i feel as if death is my only option. im scared about whats going to happen after death. i ahve a lot of hopes for it though.

I want you to forget everything i wrote about my parents. its not right that they do things my way.but i hope that after i die, instead of sitting and crying crying and crying they try to understand through my diary how i felt. if they cant be sympathetic about my actions, then i hope they can at least be empathetic by honestly putting themselves in my place and reasoning level. I will always remain a Jain no matter where I go. I dont know what's going to happen after death. but i will always want nirvana. i hope daddy and mummy can help the millions of people still alive who are beginning to feel what led to my decision. Sometimes tradition isnt the best. Time never stops. The same way nothing ever remains the same. please know that I am very peaceful about this. i am not doing this for a desperate cry for help, though, one month back i would have.

hi again. It's officially thursday! And guess what i found out from my mom...that today is my birthday. I was born on a day called "chaudas" and i believe it was a full moon. I was born on a thursday and i will die on a thursday. Lovely. So I am 17 tom. i kinda feel weird writing like im writing to an audience, because i know no one is reading this. so I guess this becomes a diary. I wish none has to feel what i did. But I know there are people in this world who are feeling what I am. It's not fun to be miserable 24/7, and what makes it worse is that it seems so overwhelming. Like it will eat you up if you dont do something about it. It's a living hell. I would have loved to help people, but i unfortuantely could not make things better. The people they consider "professionals' seem to want to help because it's their job, not becasue they want to. Im sry if there are profs who actually want to help because it's more than a job for them. The people who want to help dont understand, and those that do consider helping a job. i want to be there for people, but instead of that i ended up living a daily hell and nightmare. I know people have been through much much worse. But i am corroded. I can not go on one more minute. The more I think about it, how will counseling even help? Will i be able to forget this nightmarish life i've been living for some time? I know I wont forget it. It'll haunt me forever and ever. im sure im to blame to some extent. u know, since soph year, i've tried my best to help those with low esteem and confidence, but neither could i help nor could i make things better for myself. i tried acheiving, but each time i went one step back. i hope i can come back very very soon so that i can help as many people i can. so no jignasha has to ever end the way im ending. so no jignasha can be misunderstood the way i was. so no jignasha has to feel like she dies every minute when she's alive. so no jignasha takes some things involving family as hard as i did. so no jignasha feels as miserable as i did that she has no option but death left. I love people. all i wanted was to help. thats all. but my dreams will come true. very very soon. if u dont believe in an afterlife, you will soon. I love poeple. i love anything alive.

Hi! Im thrilled. it's already Wed. I cant wait until tom. I have one major concern though. What if I survive? I still have it planned for tom. though. The past two days, I've been having these freaky thoughts. Im not gona write them. Thats how freaky they are. Whether I get to come back on or not....i'll be dead tom. whoohoo!

Hi. i honestly doubt anybody reads my entries. I just write becasue I can't manage to tell people that love me how insecure and un confident I am. Things have changed a little bit. I have finished junior year now and I am surviving the summer. Forget (not that anyone reads this...thank God)what i wrote about my friend Neleh, whose real name is Helen Murphy. I actually have another account on livejournal that my friends know about. My real name is Jignasha adhuria. I really belive what i wrote about Helen was very immature. People are people. i dont want to go into that subject for now. Just know, that I love Helen. She is very important to me. It was very childish of me o even feel what i felt; infact, Danielle is a very nice person. Sometimes things dont turn out to be the way you think of them. My problems start with me and end with me. actually i ended up telling helen and donna about the suicidal thoughts i was having. i belive the people close to me deserve to know, not becasue i even ahve a desire to get help, but becasue it's their right to know. I cant tell shradhdha, she's only 13. I'll write a letter or something to her. I can tell Tesla, who i dearly love. She's one person the makes me wanna live, and makes me worry about what she will think when i do it. I cant tell you how important she is for me. All my firends and human beings r important to me, dont get me wrong, but tesla has had a positive impact in my life. she's one person i dont feel uncertain with. im going to tell her like moments before...so there's no chance for survival. shradhdha is my sister. that tells u all my feelings for her. pinku is my brother, that tells u all my feelings for him. i love him. i wish he'd understand though. some things yes he does understand...but...he's damn important for me. ok, im willing to accept it now. i have been going through depression through my junior year. i've had thoughts of suicide since freshmen year; infact, i thought of doing it once in a while (actively). But it'd be like once a month and it wasnt cuz i was sad. usually it'd be cuz my mom said something piercing. but this year...may june and july i've really wanted to die. I've felt so miserable and horrible. an unexplainable miserable. its unbearable. in june, i started taking extra pills but not enough to kill me. Like i took 13 tylenols and the next day, i took 10. then ove the weekend i took 16. i no it wouldnt kill me, but i still took them. lately i've been cutting my wrist, trying to figure out how hard it'll be to get to my artery. right now i really dont need to tell anyone though. im not confused anymore. all week i've said to myself just go on until thursday. n thurs is fast approaching...im so glad. i dont want anyone to feel the way i've been feeling. but thurs...it'll be all better. so whether someone reads this or not....well it is a journal..isnt it?
Anyway, i've felt so resolved once i made the deicsion. now no one can stop me. i've actually approached my friends and have been cheerful...without any difficulty!
